name: The Thrill of the Fight - VR Boxing
description: The Thrill of the Fight is a room-scale VR boxing game. Face off in the virtual ring where you'll jab, dodge, and sweat your way to the top of the boxing world. Grab your gloves, step through the ropes, and become a champion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-3450 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11
